ProjectTitle: Discovering the role of the circadian clock morning components in plant latitudinal adaptation
InitialFeedbackHistory: 13/03/2024 [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you only describe the data that you share with external researchers via a repository (ENA and figshare), the description of the storage of data that you keep internally fits better under preservation. [REDACTED] describe sharing of sequencing and image data but mention a software licence, are you also planning to share code/software, ENA has its own terms and conditions (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/about/policies) and for images a creative commons licence is more appropriatie, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/licenses
